snippet.title: Serious Scramblers iOS Release date
snippet.description:
Play now: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/serious-scramblers/id1289369947

A seemingly bottomless pit has appeared and bloodcurdling shrieks can be heard from the depths. What lies in the deep? The only reasonable thing to do is to jump in and find out!

Overcome insurmountable odds in this highly challenging jumpless platformer!
Welcome to Serious Scramblers!

Features:
• Fast-paced arcade action
• Variety of obstacles and creatures
• Challenging gameplay
• Massive boss fight
• Unlock various characters, each with game-changing abilities
• Sweet, sweet chiptune music
